metadata.title: Raply - Automated Advertising Reports with AI Insights
metadata.description: Generate professional advertising reports from Meta Ads and Google Ads in 5 minutes. With AI-powered insights that actually help. Start free, no credit card required.

hero.headline: Stop Spending Hours on
hero.subheadline: Generate professional advertising reports from Meta Ads and Google Ads in 5 minutes. With AI-powered insights that actually help.

features.heading: Everything You Need to Create
features.subheading: Raply handles the boring stuff so you can focus on what matters: growing your clients' businesses.
features.feature1Description: Generate professional reports in minutes, not hours. Connect your ad accounts and let AI do the heavy lifting.
features.feature2Description: Claude AI explains complex metrics in plain language and provides actionable optimization recommendations.
features.feature3Description: Connect all your accounts in one place. Get unified reports across platforms with consistent formatting.
features.feature4Description: Stop copy-pasting data from dashboards. Automated data fetching means you focus on strategy, not spreadsheets.
features.feature5Description: Beautiful, client-ready PDF exports. Customizable templates with your branding and color schemes.
features.feature6Description: Send reports directly to clients from the app. Schedule recurring reports or send on-demand.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: Three simple steps to your first professional report. No training required.
howItWorks.step1Description: One-click OAuth integration with Meta Ads and Google Ads. Secure, fast, no manual API keys needed.
howItWorks.step2Description: Select from pre-built templates (Leads, Sales, Reach) or create custom reports. Pick any date range.
howItWorks.step3Description: Claude AI analyzes your data, generates insights, and creates a beautiful PDF ready to send to clients.

pricing.heading: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subheading: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

testimonials.heading: Loved by Marketers
testimonials.subheading: Join hundreds of freelancers and agencies who trust Raply for their reporting needs.
testimonials.testimonial1Quote: Raply cut my reporting time from 3 hours to 10 minutes. The AI insights actually help me optimize campaigns better than manual analysis.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: My clients love the professional PDF reports. I can finally spend time on strategy instead of copy-pasting data from Facebook Ads Manager.
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: The Meta + Google Ads integration is seamless. We onboarded our entire team in one day and haven't looked back since.

finalCta.heading: Ready to Save Hours on Reporting?
finalCta.subheading: Join hundreds of marketers who trust Raply to automate their advertising reports. Start free, no credit card required.
finalCta.footnote: Free plan available • No credit card required • Cancel anytime

footer.description: Automated advertising reports with AI-powered insights for Meta Ads and Google Ads.
footer.copyright: Raply. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for marketers.

home.recentReportsEmpty: No reports yet. Create your first report to see it here.
home.emptyStateHeading: Start by connecting an ad account
home.emptyStateDescription: Connect your first Meta Ads or Google Ads account to start generating reports.

subscription.freePlanBanner: You're on the free plan. Upgrade to unlock more reports and AI insights.
subscription.limitReached: You've reached your plan's report limit. Upgrade to generate more reports.

reports.heading: All Reports
reports.emptyStateDescription: Create your first report to see it here.

reportWizard.heading: Create New Report
reportWizard.subheading: Generate a professional advertising report in 4 easy steps
reportWizard.step1Description: Choose which advertising account to generate the report for
reportWizard.step2Description: Select the type of report you want to create
reportWizard.step3Description: Choose the time period for your report
reportWizard.step4Description: Confirm your selections and generate the report
reportWizard.comingSoonDescription: Report creator wizard will be available in an upcoming update. For now, you can browse available templates.
reportWizard.needIntegrationDescription: Before creating a report, you need to connect a Meta Ads or Google Ads account.
reportWizard.templateLeadsDescription: For lead generation and form campaigns

reportDetail.comingSoonDescription: Full report view with metrics, charts, and AI insights will be available in an upcoming update.
reportDetail.comingSoonDetails: For now, you can see basic report information. PDF export and email sending will be available soon.
reportDetail.reportContentDescription: Metrics, charts, and AI insights will appear here

integrations.heading: Integrations
integrations.comingSoonDescription: OAuth integrations with Meta Ads and Google Ads will be available in an upcoming update.
integrations.metaDescription: Connect Facebook Ads and Instagram Ads accounts
integrations.googleDescription: Connect Google Ads and YouTube Ads accounts
integrations.needHelpDescription: View our documentation on connecting advertising accounts
